description: Systeme.io is a CRM platform that allows you to manage your contacts, sales, and marketing campaigns.

actions.name: addTagToContact
actions.description: Assign a tag to an existing contact - select an existing tag or create a new one

actions.name: createContact
actions.description: Create a new contact with email and contact fields from your Systeme.io account, with optional tags

actions.name: findContactByEmail
actions.description: Locate an existing contact by email address

actions.name: removeTagFromContact
actions.description: Remove a tag that is currently assigned to an existing contact

actions.name: updateContact
actions.description: Update fields (name, phone, custom fields) of an existing contact using fields from your Systeme.io account

triggers.name: newContact
triggers.description: Fires when a new contact is created

triggers.name: newSale
triggers.description: Fires when a new purchase is made within a funnel

triggers.name: newTagAddedToContact
triggers.description: Fires when a specific tag is assigned to a contact
